title.native: あんさんぶるスターズ！

description:
An anime adaptation of the idol raising game Ensemble Stars!

The "idol-training game" takes place at a private boys' idol-training school with a history of turning out many great talents in show business. The protagonist is the school's lone female student who transfers to the school because of a special situation, and enters the school's producer department.

(Source: Anime News Network)

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Cute Boys Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around male characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Twins
tags.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

tags.name: Ninja
tags.description: Prominently features Japanese warriors traditionally trained in espionage, sabotage and assasination.

tags.name: Band
tags.description: Main cast is a group of musicians.

tags.name: Male Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several male characters who are romantically interested in them.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/tomos12)

He started working at Studio Deen, where he made his debut as animator in an episode of Dai Guard. After leaving Deen he became freelance and works mainly on productions for J.C.Staff but also on some titles for Bones, Gonzo and Feel. He is particularly renowned as bishoujo animator, since he tends to pay attention to detailed character appearance and traits for girls, as well as providing his characters cute and bashful gestures.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/YasufumiSoejima/) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/soejima_yasufumi/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/ys19710313)

A director with past experience in computer graphics. Former CG animator and director at [Gonzo](https://anilist.co/studio/3/GONZO). He is currently affiliated with [David Production](https://anilist.co/studio/287/).

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/濱野高年)

Affiliated with Magic Capsule.

__[Website](http://shogo.strikes.jp/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/shogoy)__

__Shougo Yasukawa__ is a Japanese script/screenwriter, series composer and lyricist.

Daman Mills is an American voice actor affiliated with FUNimation Entertainment. 

__Non-Anime Roles:__

- Blade - Honkai: Star Rail (VG)
- Lyney - Genshin Impact
